column4: I am trying to figure out how to extract pics that are .svgz? My reading claims that it is a gzipped file..however gzip -d filename, or gunip filename says it doesn't understand the extension...inkscape can view it..but I can't save it as .png or .jpg
Need someone to school me on how to add my hard drive to the gnome desktop?
just mount it, it'll show up.
Alas this is not the case...
